translation.en: Well, it turns out I can't fix a simple kitchen sink.
translation.es: Resulta que no sé arreglar ni un grifo.

translation.en: -I was about to fill it in the tub. -Okay. I'm here to fix this.
translation.es: - Iba a llenarla en la tina. - Bueno, lo solucionaré.

translation.en: And give me a nice big "aah."
translation.es: Quiero que abras bien grande la boca.

translation.en: Ah, just as I suspected.
Ah, what do you suspect?
The common cold. Your immune system is run down.
translation.es: Es un resfriado común. Tienes bajas las defensas.

translation.en: Bed-rest and fluids are the only cure, I'm afraid.
translation.es: La única cura es reposar y beber líquido.

translation.en: -Kia ora. -Manaaki.
Oh, love.
-Is it a cold? -Yeah, afraid so.
Drink this.
[sighs] Okay.
Oh, this... Wow.
Yeah, I called in a prescription for Peter's kūmara curry soup.
translation.es: Te receté una sopa de curry y camote de Peter.

translation.en: -Spice is the trick to knock out the cold. -Yeah, a little spicy.
translation.es: - El picante ayuda con el resfrío. - Es picante.

translation.en: -More. -Yeah.
[Jake] G'day!
Did you guys come in a clown car?
Kitchen sink's still munted, eh?
Who ever could have told you that?
And a little something for your tea.
Helps with a sore throat. From my bees.
translation.es: Alivia el dolor de garganta. De mis abejas.

translation.en: -Your bees? -Bees.
-Like buzzing bees? -Uh, yeah, bees. I'm gonna have a squiz at your kitchen sink.
translation.es: - ¿Las que zumban? - Sí. Iré a revisar el fregadero.

translation.en: Fever dream.
Oh, Jake, wait.
[sighs] You guys...
I'm running low on cash. Gabriela, love, no.
translation.es: - Me queda poco dinero. - Gabriela, no, cariño.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm not here on a job. It's okay. We're here because we're your mates.
translation.es: - No vine a trabajar. Tranquila. - Vinimos porque somos tus amigos.

translation.en: As long as you're here, you’re whānau.
One of us.
And we look after our own.
Here.
Now, off to bed, young lady.
Come on.
He's so cute when he talks sternly.
translation.es: Es muy tierno cuando se hace el severo.

translation.en: [Gabriela] That was so good.
-I said it right, right? -Yeah, you did.
Okay, good.
-They're so cute. -Thank you.
Oh, Gabriela! Did you care to buy a raffle ticket?
translation.es: Gabriela, ¿quieres comprar un boleto para la rifa?

translation.en: Oh, uh, let me see.
Oh, do you have change for a twenty?
No, I don't, but it's for a worthy cause, so there you go.
translation.es: No, pero es para una buena causa, así que toma.

translation.en: -Okay, thanks. -Anytime. Hey...
have you given any thought to my offer?
I spoke to my husband, and we could wire some money through.
translation.es: Hablé con mi marido y podríamos transferirte dinero.

translation.en: Charlotte, I'm...
I'm gonna turn it down.
Come again?
I'm just not willing to give up on my dream.
translation.es: No quiero renunciar a mi sueño.

translation.en: At least not yet.
Can we still be friends?
Don't give it a moment's thought.
Oh! Sorry.
Is that a yes?
[Jake] Let's go. Oh!
Come on, Tim! I've coached you for five seasons, man.
What do they teach you in that fancy university, huh?
translation.es: ¿Qué te enseñan en esa universidad elegante? ACIERTA Y AL AGUA

translation.en: Well, well, well, if it isn't the American. You care to test your skills?
translation.es: Vaya, llegó la estadounidense. ¿Probarás tus habilidades?

translation.en: Just wanted to say thank you for helping fix my sink and my window, Jake.
translation.es: Gracias por haber arreglado el fregadero y la ventana, Jake.

translation.en: Around here, I go by Chief Taylor.
translation.es: Aquí me conocen como jefe Taylor.

translation.en: You're a fireman? A volunteer firefighter. Yeah, we all are.
Okay, Chief Taylor.
Um, I was hoping to talk to you about a proposition? [Jake] A proposition?
As you can see, I'm a little preoccupied at the moment,
translation.es: Como ves, estoy un poco ocupado,

translation.en: but if you care to make a donation, I might be able to give you a minute.
translation.es: pero, si haces una donación, te doy un minuto.

translation.en: If not, I might schedule you in next week. Maybe.
translation.es: Si no, quizá te agende para la semana que viene.

translation.en: Next week? You're looking for trouble, aren't you?
Trouble from who? A girl who can't work a clutch to save her--
translation.es: ¿Con quién? Con una chica que no sabe ni...

translation.en: -[Jake] Oh. That was pretty good. -[man 3] Nice shot.
Where'd you learn to throw like that?
Well, I was the pitcher for my high school softball team.
translation.es: Era la lanzadora de mi equipo de sóftbol de secundaria.

translation.en: Full of surprises.
Yeah, well, if you think that's a surprise, try this.
translation.es: Si eso te parece una sorpresa, ¿qué tal esto?

translation.en: How would you like to collaborate on the Bellbird?
Thank you.
Thanks.
What's made you change your mind?
[clears throat] I'm learning that there is a difference
between someone thinking I'm helpless and someone genuinely offering me help.
translation.es: entre alguien que me considera inútil y alguien que realmente me ofrece ayuda.

translation.en: -Go ahead. All right, say it. -What?
"Told you so."
Ah, yeah. No. I've...
I've learned the hard way that you don't like being told what to do.
translation.es: Aprendí por las malas que no te gusta que te digan qué hacer.

translation.en: And besides... it'd start this partnership off on the wrong foot.
translation.es: Además, empezaría este acuerdo con el pie izquierdo.

translation.en: Wait, so... So that means you'll do it?
Yeah.
So, how do we make this partnership work?
Well, what's your plan?
To stay?
Or go back to San Francisco when the Bellbird's back on her feet?
translation.es: ¿O volverás a San Francisco al terminar?

translation.en: Well, I do have my real life to get back to. Oh, your real life. Okay, got it.
translation.es: - Bueno, debo volver a mi vida real. - Tu vida real, entiendo.

translation.en: Okay, we'll do the work 50/50, split the costs 50/50,
translation.es: Bueno, dividimos los gastos y el trabajo por la mitad,

translation.en: and split the profit 50/50 when we sell it.
translation.es: y lo mismo con la ganancia cuando la vendamos.

translation.en: Okay. Sounds good to me, partner.
Partner.
You cannot get rid of this stove.
This is not Little House on the Prairie. We need a modern kitchen.
translation.es: No es Little House on the Prairie. Hay que renovar.

translation.en: This is a work of art, princess. All right? It's a Waterford Stanley wood burner from Ireland.
translation.es: Es una obra de arte, princesa. Es un Waterford Stanley de Irlanda.

translation.en: That's nearly 400 kgs of steel.
Four-hundred... Whatever. I don't do the metric system.
translation.es: ¿Qué importa? No entiendo el sistema decimal.

translation.en: Listen, like your kitchen sink, just because something's munted...
translation.es: Es el mismo caso que el fregadero. Que esté roto no significa que no pueda arreglarse.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -...it doesn't mean it can't be fixed.
translation.es: Que esté roto no significa que no pueda arreglarse.

translation.en: You've gotta work with what you have here in New Zealand. Don't touch--
translation.es: En Nueva Zelanda, debes trabajar con lo que hay. No toques...

translation.en: Brilliant.
You see? Broken.
The fireplace is pure, original craftsmanship. The woodwork alone, it tells a story.
translation.es: La chimenea es un trabajo original. La carpintería cuenta una historia.

translation.en: Yeah, a story that says, "Replace me. I'm old and a fire hazard."
translation.es: Dice: "Reemplácenme, soy vieja y puedo causar un incendio".

translation.en: -It's time to drag Bellbird Valley... -Going swimmingly so far, I see.
translation.es: - Es hora de llevar a... - Su relación va a las mil maravillas.

translation.en: I can't quite make out if they're meant to fall in love or kill each other.
translation.es: No sé si van a enamorarse o asesinarse.

translation.en: Maybe both.
How exciting.
[Jake] Solar panels?
That'll ruin the inn's original charm.
Drink this in.
Glorious sunshine.
translation.es: La luz del sol es gloriosa.

translation.en: Ah, yes.
I want to fuel the inn with the warmth and the power of the sun.
translation.es: Quiero alimentar la posada con el calor y la energía del sol.

translation.en: What's more soulful than that?
Sledge-hammering should be the new self-care.
translation.es: Esta debería ser otra manera de liberar estrés.

translation.en: It's pretty therapeutic. Good job.
-Wait, wait, wait! Stop! -What?
It looks like... old letters.
Well, they're... love letters.
But what are they doing stuffed inside a wall?
Uh, old custom. Concealing or burying items in the structure of the house.
translation.es: Ocultar objetos en la estructura de la casa es una antigua costumbre.

translation.en: So... enlighten me.
Okay.
Well, it's called immurement.
So the ancient Egyptians would...
translation.es: Los antiguos egipcios dejaban objetos ocultos

translation.en: leave artifacts entombed in the pyramid walls with the pharaohs.
translation.es: Los antiguos egipcios dejaban objetos ocultos en las paredes de las pirámides con los faraones.

translation.en: Some say it's superstition.
translation.es: Algunos dicen que es una superstición.

translation.en: Some say it's good luck.
But I say it's a thread... linking the past to the future.
translation.es: Para mí es un hilo que une el pasado con el futuro.

translation.en: A house...
A house remembers everyone who ever lived in it.
translation.es: Una casa recuerda a todos los que vivieron en ella.

translation.en: What?
You were gazing.
No, I wasn't.
Yeah, you were.
Wistfully.
[softly] I don't do wistfully.
[whispers] Yes, you do.
Do you need a moment? I can get you some tissues.
You're having fun with this, aren't you?
-Kinda. -Kinda.
Do you think it's snooping because we were looking at these letters?
translation.es: ¿Crees que leer estas cartas es fisgonear?

translation.en: Oh, okay. So now someone's getting a soft spot for dusty, old history, eh?
translation.es: Vaya, parece que alguien tiene debilidad por las historias antiguas.

translation.en: LEDs are 80% more energy efficient.
translation.es: Las luces LED son un 80 % más eficientes.

translation.en: [giggles] Sweet as.
-Oh, look at you, adopting the lingo, eh? -[chuckles] Yeah, I'm trying.
translation.es: Mírate, hablas como nosotros. Eso intento.

translation.en: Also, wait. When we redo the sink and the counter...
translation.es: Y cuando renovemos el fregadero y la encimera...

translation.en: Yeah?
...can we reinstall... this? Ta-da!
What about your fancy, new faucet?
Oh, it'll take all of five minutes to swap it out for this beaut.
translation.es: Tardaremos cinco minutos en reemplazarlo por esta belleza.

translation.en: [Jake] Man...
Wow, you really like your faucets, don't you?
Shelley, where's my fertilizer? I already checked out the back.
translation.es: Shelley, ¿y mi fertilizante? Ya revisé atrás.

translation.en: Charlotte. It seems I'm sold out, but I will rush-order you in some more.
translation.es: Charlotte, parece que se agotó, pero pediré más cuanto antes.

translation.en: Out? It's my special-order fertilizer. Who else buys it?
translation.es: ¿Se agotó? Es mi fertilizante especial. ¿Quién más lo compra?

translation.en: I have known you since kindergarten.
translation.es: Te conozco desde el jardín de niños.

translation.en: We're Beechwood Downs, born and raised.
Gabriela is an outsider, an interloper, and you just... You give her my fertilizer?
translation.es: Gabriela es una extranjera, una intrusa. ¿Y le diste mi fertilizante?

translation.en: It's brand-name poop, love. There's enough to go around.
translation.es: Es caca de marca, cariño. Alcanza para todos.

translation.en: Those two look very cozy. I thought she had a bloke back in the States.
translation.es: Parecen llevarse muy bien. ¿No tenía novio en su país?

translation.en: Oh, Dean?
No, no, they're splitsville.
I mean, they're still in touch, and, you know, she could be pining just a little bit, but I don't think that's gonna...
translation.es: Siguen en contacto y puede que ella aún lo extrañe, pero no creo...

translation.en: What?
No, I know that look. Charlotte. Don't go stirring up trouble.
translation.es: No. Conozco esa mirada, Charlotte. No causes problemas.

translation.en: -Me? -Yes.
Never.
[Jake] It's starting to come together.
[Gabriela] These tiles match perfectly.
[Jake] They're manufactured from the same era. I got 'em online at Trade Me.
translation.es: Son de la misma época. Las compré en línea, en Trade Me.

translation.en: Huh, look at you, embracing technology. All right. There's hope for you yet.
translation.es: Mira cómo aceptas la tecnología. Aún hay esperanza para ti.

translation.en: Want to help a girl grout?
Because I cannot smooth this out. No, you've gotta go... So, just go... Yeah, this way.
translation.es: - No consigo alisarlo. - Solo debes hacer así, para este lado.

translation.en: And then, just... that's it.
[Jake] Yeah.
Like that.
You're right. She's a beaut.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Es toda una belleza.

translation.en: She sure is.
What's that?
My gray water recycler.
Yeah, it treats and reuses the dishwasher water as drip irrigation for our new garden.
translation.es: Recicla el agua del lavavajillas para reusarla y regar la huerta.

translation.en: Ugh, that's disgusting. Wouldn't you want clean water for your veggies? Come on.
translation.es: Qué asqueroso. ¿No quieres regar las verduras con agua limpia?

translation.en: Uh, that's the point. The recycler cleans the water.
translation.es: Esa es la idea. La recicladora limpia el agua.

translation.en: You're messing with me, aren't you?
Easy target.
No, the gray water recycler... I'm into it.
translation.es: Me gusta la recicladora de aguas grises.

translation.en: Good. Me too. It's not going anywhere.
translation.es: A mí también, y aquí se quedará.

translation.en: Ah, it seems Gilbert's into it, too.
Gilbert!
[Gabriela] Where are we going?
[Jake] To my place. We need to get some tools. Be there in another ten.
translation.es: A mi casa. Necesitamos herramientas. Llegaremos en diez minutos.

translation.en: [woman on radio] ...in the hive by collecting a sample.
There are two methods...
What is this?
"Buzzworthy." Beekeeping news. It's very informative.
translation.es: "Buzzworthy", noticias de apicultura. Es muy informativo.

translation.en: So much information on there.
Okay, can I cha-- I'm changing it.
Oh, gosh.
You can turn it.
Hey, you... It's your car, I told you.
translation.es: Oye, es tu auto, ya te lo dije.

translation.en: -This is the best thing I could find. -You didn't look very hard.
translation.es: Es lo mejor que encontré. No buscaste mucho.

translation.en: [Jake] Wow, that's a happening song, and I like it.
translation.es: - Es una canción de moda y me gusta. - Ahora es mi canción.

translation.en: -[Gabriela] It's my jam now. -It's your jam now?
translation.es: - Es una canción de moda y me gusta. - Ahora es mi canción. - ¿Tu canción? - ¡Sí!

translation.en: -[Gabriela] Yes! -Thought you didn't like it.
All righty.
Well...
This is it.
This is great.
Yeah, my gran built it in the '60s.
translation.es: Mi abuela la construyó en los 60.

translation.en: You know, you remind me a bit of my gran.
translation.es: Me recuerdas un poco a ella.

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
Is it because of my pioneer woman spirit?
Because you're both impossible. Come on.
translation.es: Ambas son imposibles de tratar. Vamos.

translation.en: Home sweet home.
Cozy.
Taxidermy?
Is that a... stuffed possum, or is there something I need to worry about, Jake?
translation.es: ¿Es una zarigüeya disecada? ¿Debo preocuparme de algo, Jake?

translation.en: My gran had one vendetta, possums.
translation.es: Mi abuela tenía un enemigo, las zarigüeyas.

translation.en: And that fella right there ate all of her avocados, so... [chuckles]
translation.es: Esa se comió todos sus aguacates, así que...

translation.en: Well, she trapped him, and she got her revenge.
translation.es: Bueno, la atrapó y se vengó.

translation.en: Well, you definitely made this place a home.
translation.es: Sin dudas, la convertiste en un hogar.

translation.en: I moved out here after Megan passed.
translation.es: Me mudé aquí luego de la muerte de Megan.

translation.en: It's okay. I'm pretty confident someone in town spilled the beans.
translation.es: Está bien. Estoy seguro de que algún vecino ya te contó.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yeah.
Uh, Megan...
She didn't like the rural life. It was...
translation.es: ...no le gustaba la vida de campo.

translation.en: It was too far out for her.
So we'd been renting a place in town.
But after she died, I just...
came back.
Yeah, I was in the mood to be alone for a while.
translation.es: Tenía ganas de estar solo un tiempo.

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
Yeah, me too.
I'm guessing the universe has its own plans for things, eh?
translation.es: Supongo que el universo tiene sus propios planes, ¿no?

translation.en: Yes, it does.
Anyway. [clears throat] Right. This is it.
-Let's do it. -Okay.
When you said solar panels, I kept imagining huge and ugly.
translation.es: Cuando hablaste de paneles solares, los imaginé enormes y feos.

translation.en: Well, the best thing about technology is it's ever-evolving. Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Lo mejor de la tecnología es que evoluciona constantemente.

translation.en: These panels will help power the inn and they won't compromise curb appeal.
translation.es: Los paneles alimentarán la posada sin arruinar su encanto.

translation.en: I've gotta admit, it's pretty cool.
Wait, what was that?
-What? -Was that you admitting defeat?
[groans] How is gracious acceptance considered defeat?
-Ooh, yeah. -Settle down.
-[Gabriela chuckles] -All right, I'll give Norman a call up so he and his boys can haul away this junk.
translation.es: Llamaré a Norman para ver si puede retirar la basura.

translation.en: Ooh, FYI, he goes by Norm now.
translation.es: Por cierto, ahora se llama Norm.

translation.en: -Yeah, of course he does. -[chuckles] Get it right.
Are you okay?
-Hey, you all right? -It was, um...
It was... It was a snake.
A snake...
Y-You mean that snake?
Yeah, fun fact about New Zealand, there are no snakes.
translation.es: Un dato curioso sobre Nueva Zelanda: no hay serpientes.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[chuckles] Thanks for breaking my fall.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias por amortiguar mi caída.

translation.en: Anytime.
-I'll go check on that railing. -Yeah.
translation.es: - Iré a revisar la barandilla. - Sí.

translation.en: I thought we were friends, mate.
Hey, hey! Ah, ah, ah!
No fly zone.
This is my area of total artistic expression. -[Gabriela chuckles] -Okay?
translation.es: Esta es mi área de expresión artística, ¿entendido?

translation.en: All right, go ahead.
-Go ahead. -Let your inner Picasso out. Thank you.
translation.es: - Deja salir a tu Picasso interior. - Gracias.

translation.en: You know what?
What do you reckon? Finished for the day?
[sighs] I reckon we've earned a beer.
-[Gabriela grunts] -Yeah, me too.
-[Gabriela clears throat] -Hey. Hey.
-[Gabriela] Here you go. -Cheers.
Cheers.
[Gabriela] So...
this... -Your place. -[Jake] Yeah.
What's with you and the, uh... the old houses, huh?
translation.es: ¿Qué te atrae de las casas antiguas?

translation.en: Is that like your thing?
Well, I always took to building since I was a little fella.
translation.es: Desde pequeño me gusta la construcción,

translation.en: You know, creating something from nothing.
translation.es: crear algo a partir de la nada.

translation.en: And after... Megan was gone, and after I finished the reno at gran's place, I, uh...
translation.es: Y luego de lo de Megan, cuando terminé de renovar la casa de mi abuela...

translation.en: I found I liked fixing broken things the most.
translation.es: ...descubrí que me encantaba arreglar cosas rotas,

translation.en: You know, the buildings others gave up on.
It's hard yakka, but...
Yeah, it makes me feel a little, uh, less...
translation.es: ...pero me hace sentir un poco menos...

translation.en: A little less broken?
Yeah.
Something like that.
Go on.
I spilled my guts. It's your turn.
translation.es: Yo ya me sinceré, es tu turno.

translation.en: Okay.
Well, as I'm sure you've probably pieced together,
translation.es: Como ya debes de haber notado...

translation.en: things weren't so stellar back in San Francisco.
translation.es: ...no me iba muy bien en San Francisco.

translation.en: I had a low point, by which I mean...
translation.es: Toqué fondo y con eso me refiero

translation.en: days of me laying on my couch in pajamas,
translation.es: a que estuve varios días acostada en el sofá en pijama,

translation.en: drowning my sorrows in pralines and cream and way too much wine.
translation.es: ahogando mis penas en helado y un exceso de vino.

translation.en: I entered a "Win an Inn" contest.
translation.es: Me anoté en el concurso "Gana una posada".

translation.en: And as you would say, it's been hard yakka.
translation.es: Y, como dirías tú, fue agotador.

translation.en: No, seriously.
This place has really grown on me. I'm gonna miss it.
translation.es: Realmente me encariñé con el lugar. Lo extrañaré.

translation.en: You know what?
Clearly, New Zealand hasn't done her job convincing you to stay, but...
translation.es: Claramente Nueva Zelanda aún no te convenció de que te quedes,

translation.en: but we can fix that, so I'm declaring tomorrow a holiday.
translation.es: pero podemos solucionarlo mañana, que declaro día libre.

translation.en: Okay.
A day off. What, you don't have those in America?
translation.es: Un día libre. ¿En tu país no hay vacaciones?

translation.en: No, we do, it's just we don't really take them, you know, with the whole career hamster wheel and all.
translation.es: Hay vacaciones, pero no las tomamos porque trabajamos como hámsteres.

translation.en: Right. Well, I'll pick you up early. Wear your togs, okay?
translation.es: Te pasaré a buscar temprano. Ponte traje de baño.

translation.en: -Togs? -Yeah, your togs.
And get some real boots, not those fashion ones.
translation.es: Y consigue botas de verdad, no las elegantes.

translation.en: Ones you can tramp in.
So, is this like a date with Jake?
[giggles] I'm not sure, but we're tramping.
translation.es: No estoy segura, pero iremos a caminar.

translation.en: Whatever that means.
-[laughs] -But what about you? How's everything with the doc?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de ti? ¿Cómo va todo con el doctor?

translation.en: Okay, so I took your advice, and I was about to ask him out,
translation.es: Seguí tu consejo y estuve a punto de invitarlo a salir,

translation.en: but then he beat me to it.
translation.es: pero él me ganó de mano.

translation.en: Details.
Now.
He's taking me to this blues club that's a few towns over, uh, tomorrow night.
translation.es: Me llevará a un club de blues en otro pueblo mañana a la noche.

translation.en: Ooh, I've got a good feeling about this.
It's just so weird to think that this whole time
translation.es: Es raro pensar que estuvo todo el tiempo bajo mis narices.

translation.en: -he was right there under my nose. -[Gabriela] That's why you didn't see it.
translation.es: Es raro pensar que estuvo todo el tiempo bajo mis narices. Por eso no lo viste.

translation.en: [Shelley] And that is exactly why we're going to stop talking about it because I'm going to jinx it otherwise.
translation.es: Y por eso dejaremos de hablar del tema o me traerá mala suerte.

translation.en: Now, I have signed up to be the chair of the Beechwood Downs Harvest Festival.
translation.es: Me inscribí para ser la presidenta del Festival de la Cosecha del pueblo.

translation.en: Please tell me that you will come and be on the committee with me.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que formarás parte del comité.

translation.en: Oh, right.
Right, of course. No, you'll be long gone by then.
translation.es: Claro, para entonces ya te habrás ido.

translation.en: [Gabriela] Yeah, the inn will be done by then.
You know, it's funny.
The more I think about leaving, the more I want to stay.
translation.es: Cuanto más pienso en irme, más me quiero quedar.

translation.en: Please! I would be so stoked if you stayed.
translation.es: Por favor, me encantaría que te quedaras.

translation.en: I mean, everybody would be.
I'll tell you who wouldn't be stoked. Charlotte.
translation.es: ¿Sabes a quién no le encantaría? A Charlotte.

translation.en: I think I've crushed her dream of lording over a B&B empire.
translation.es: Creo que arruiné su sueño de administrar un imperio hotelero.

translation.en: You know, she'd pack a sad, but that's Charlotte.
translation.es: Se pondría de mal humor, pero es Charlotte, luego se le pasaría.

translation.en: inns are about home and...
community and...
connecting with guests on a personal level.
translation.es: Implican conectar con los huéspedes a nivel personal.

translation.en: I could use the fire insurance money
translation.es: Podría usar el dinero del seguro

translation.en: and buy the Bellbird and fix up the Tea Rose House later.
translation.es: para comprar Bellbird y renovar Tea Rose House luego.

translation.en: You don't have to do that.
This isn't about me winning... your inn.
translation.es: No es que quiera lo que es tuyo.

translation.en: It's about not giving up on what you love.
translation.es: No hay que renunciar a lo que amas.

translation.en: It's all about love.
I'm not selling Bellbird Valley Farm.
What?
To anyone.
Look, I've been ignoring all the signs that I should stay here.
translation.es: Ignoré todas las señales de que debo quedarme.

translation.en: And... after yesterday's fire, it was... it was like the universe shook me by my shoulders.
translation.es: Luego del incendio de ayer, sentí que el universo me dio una sacudida.

translation.en: My real life...
isn't in San Francisco.
It's here.
With Gilbert,
and the cafe,
and... and waking up every morning in a house...
translation.es: Despertándome cada mañana en una casa...

translation.en: that is my dream home.
That was beautiful.
I knew New Zealand would be a waste of time.
translation.es: Sabía que Nueva Zelanda sería una pérdida de tiempo.

translation.en: You're one of us now. The Bellbird's in safe hands. Oh!
translation.es: Ya eres uno de nosotros. Bellbird está en buenas manos.

translation.en: -Thank you. -Oh, hugging. [shudders]
I'm not very good with hugging.
translation.es: No soy buena con los abrazos.

translation.en: Oh, Jake.
We are partnered 50/50 on the inn.
You want to tell me your terms?
I'll let you know.
[Shelley] I can't believe you're finally the owner of the Bellbird!
translation.es: No puedo creer que al final seas la dueña de Bellbird.

translation.en: -Crazy. -Yeah.
And I'm sure that Jake will come around.
translation.es: Estoy segura de que Jake entrará en razón.

translation.en: Everything happens for a reason.
And you know that I'm here for you, okay?
We'll talk soon.
Hi.
Hi.
Are you mad about earlier?
Oh, yeah. You mean the part where you turned down a massive pay day for the two of us...
translation.es: ¿Preguntas si me enojé porque rechazaste una enorme cantidad de dinero

translation.en: and then asked my terms?
I did do that, didn't I?
It's no worries.
Hey, I, uh...
I wanted to show you something Hana dug up in the council offices.
translation.es: Quería mostrarte algo que encontró Hana en las oficinas del ayuntamiento.

translation.en: They have a record of marriages going back over a hundred years.
translation.es: Tienen actas de matrimonio de más de cien años de antigüedad.

translation.en: This is them.
Hazel "Firefly" McGibbons and...
Thomas "Lion" Leonard.
Married July 28, 1919.
translation.es: Se casaron el 28 de julio de 1919.

translation.en: They got their fairy-tale ending.
translation.es: Tuvieron un final de cuento de hadas.

translation.en: And...
You wrote me a letter?
Seems to be what you do when you want to make history.
translation.es: Parece que ese es el camino para hacer historia.

translation.en: "Dear Gabriela,
as promised, I have thought about my terms for the inn.
translation.es: ...como te lo prometí, pensé en mis condiciones para la posada.

translation.en: They are as follows:
there will always be ice cream in a picnic-ready chilly bin,
translation.es: ...siempre habrá helado en una hielerita lista para un pícnic,

translation.en: a stuffed possum guarding the fireplace,
translation.es: una zarigüeya disecada sobre la chimenea

translation.en: and a rascally goat who has the run of the farm.
translation.es: y una cabra traviesa que se pasee a sus anchas.

translation.en: Bellbird is your dream home, and it turns out it's mine, too.
translation.es: Bellbird es la casa de tus sueños y resulta que la mía también.

translation.en: I'm thinking the tradition of letter writing is something we can keep up...
translation.es: Creo que podemos continuar la tradición de escribir cartas

translation.en: when we are running the inn...
together.
With all my heart, Jake."
I'm hoping that this is a love letter and...
translation.es: Espero que sea una carta de amor

translation.en: and not a... not a business agreement.
translation.es: y no un acuerdo de negocios.

translation.en: It's definitely a love letter.
Then I guess I might get my fairy-tale ending, too.
translation.es: Supongo que también tendré mi final de cuento de hadas.

translation.en: We'll get back to him later.
Finally, we agree on something.
Yeah.
